name: Arbaz Khan

aboutpara: Highly skilled Frontend Developer with over 3 years of experience in crafting scalable, efficient, and visually stunning web applications. Proficient in ReactJs, NextJs, and TypeScript, with expertise in leveraging Firebase for seamless backend integration. Currently, I'm driving innovative frontend solutions at Codexia Technologies, delivering exceptional user experiences and driving business growth. Passionate about staying updated with the latest technologies and trends.
